title: What is the New Hanover County Sheriff\'s policy on cell phone usage by deputys.  Seems like every time I see a Sheriff\'s Patrol Car - the officer is using one hand to steer and one hand to hold the cell phone to his ear - often to the detriment of using his/her turn signal.  Seems like there should at least be a hands-free policy if the Sheriff thinks its acceptable to talk on a cell phone while driving.
